localResource.name: Storage_Domain_Name
localResource.label: Storage_Domain_Name
localResource.queryString: Select distinct v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_id, detach_date, CASE WHEN detach_date IS NULL THEN storage_domain_name ELSE storage_domain_name || ' (Detached on ' || cast(detach_date as varchar) || ')' END as combo_name from v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view, v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view WHERE v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.storage_domain_id = v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_id AND v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.datacenter_id = cast($P{P_DataCenter_ID} as uuid) AND v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_type = CASE cast($P{P_Storage_Type} as int) WHEN NULL THEN v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_type WHEN -1 THEN v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_type ELSE cast($P{P_Storage_Type} as int) END AND v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.history_id = (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view a WHERE a.storage_domain_id = v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.storage_domain_id and a.datacenter_id = v3_0_datacenter_storage_domain_map_view.datacenter_id) AND v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.history_id = (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view a WHERE a.storage_domain_id = v3_0_storage_domain_configuration_view.storage_domain_id) AND CASE WHEN $P{active_storage} like 'AND%' THEN detach_date IS NULL ELSE detach_date IS NULL OR detach_date IS NOT NULL END $P!{active_storage} order by detach_date DESC, combo_name
